title: Ghidra - Export namespaces
content:
I am currently learning to use ghidra, and I found the Symbol Tree.
Ghidra found some namespaces that I would like to export.
These namespaces don't even have to be readable, just reusable, such that I can use them in another application.
Is there any way in Ghidra to export those namespaces in a reusable form? And if not, what would be my best bet of achieving this?
Some additional information:

The namespace is written in Visual C++ or C++.
The application is running on windows, and so is Ghidra.

If any more information or clarification is needed, please tell me.
